mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.watermeth_code AS "watermethCode", a.watermeth_name AS "watermethName", a.comment AS "comment", a.ext_field1 AS "extField1", a.ext_field2 AS "extField2", a.ext_field3 AS "extField3", a.remark AS "remark"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM doc_watermeth a
AND a.watermeth_code LIKE '%'||#{watermethCode}||'%' '%'+#{watermethCode}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{watermethCode}, '%')
AND a.watermeth_name LIKE '%'||#{watermethName}||'%' '%'+#{watermethName}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{watermethName}, '%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO doc_watermeth( watermeth_code, watermeth_name, comment, ext_field1, ext_field2, ext_field3, remark ) VALUES ( #{watermethCode}, #{watermethName}, #{comment}, #{extField1}, #{extField2}, #{extField3}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE doc_watermeth SET watermeth_code = #{watermethCode}, watermeth_name = #{watermethName}, comment = #{comment}, ext_field1 = #{extField1}, ext_field2 = #{extField2}, ext_field3 = #{extField3}, remark = #{remark} WHERE id = #{id}
